title: What's Your Sign? The Science Behind Astrology
itunes:title: What's Your Sign? The Science Behind Astrology
itunes:subtitle: We get it, Scorpios are assholes
description:
This week the Basic and the Brain release an "In the vault" episode where we chat about Madz fav topic: astrology. Remember the good old days when we all would read our daily or weekly horoscope in Cosmo or Instyle, etc? Well this episode is where we dig in deeper and showcase that astrology is a lot more than just a few lines in a newspaper column (though we do talk about how it evolved into that format!). We chat about the different signs, the elements, the houses, what each of the big 3 really mean (your moon, sun and rising sun), which astrological signs make the best serial killers, and discuss the history as well as the scientific theory as to why astrology makes sense in our modern world.


Join us this week as we get to watch Aleena and Madz get into the mystic science/art of astrology!


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
